name: ORDER_RAD_STUDY
description: This table stores information about actions performed on the study in imaging departments.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record associated with this procedure order.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: STUDY_MODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The mode category ID for this study (Study Review, Transcription Entry).

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the user performing the study action.

columns.name: USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: *** Deprecated *** The deprecated column's data is no longer populated in Chronicles and is no longer available. Study user login department.

columns.name: STUDY_CHAR_CNT
columns.description: The character count for the current study. Typically used to track transcriptionist productivity.

columns.name: AUDIT_ACT_C_NAME
columns.description: The action category ID for the study (sent to transcription, signed, etc.)
entries: External Read Added to Work List
Permanent Transfer Added To Study History
Screening Form Created From Order Sign
Findings Copied from a Previous Study
Verified Findings Copied from a Previous Study
Created By Care Everywhere Order Reconciliation

columns.name: STUDY_TIME
columns.description: The amount of time (in seconds) the study was open.

columns.name: DISCREPANCY_C_NAME
columns.description: The discrepancy category ID, populated when another physician has a discrepancy with the previous result for this exam.

columns.name: DISCREPANCY_CMNT
columns.description: A free text comment associated with a discrepancy.

columns.name: DISCREPANCY_READ_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether a discrepancy has been acted on for this order. 'Y' indicates the discrepancy has been acted upon.

columns.name: STUDY_LINE_CNT
columns.description: This stores the number of imaging result text lines added with the contact. It is intended to be used in imaging transcription productivity reporting. STUDY_CHAR_CNT and STUDY_WORD_CNT can also be used for character and word counts of result text added in any given contact. All contacts should be reported on, not just the most recent contact.
